text: Koraa, ‘allahara bahirae ami ene karaobaka ahbana karaima neki, yiye amara kono upakara athaba apakara ekorae'i karaiba noraarae? Arau allahe amaka hidayata diyara pichata akau ami purbarasthalai ubhati yamane se'i byaktira darae, yaka cayatane prthiraita ene majabutabharae pa'iche ye si patha herauraa'i kinkartabyabimurha haiche? Tara ache kichumana (imandara) sahacarabrnda, sihamte taka hidayatara prati ahbana karai kaya, ‘aha amara phale aha’. Koraa, ‘allahara hidayate'i sathika hidayata arau amaka adesa karaa haiche srstijagatara rabara ocarata atmasamarpana karaibalai’
